1.4.name: wordpress/guyem-social-bookmark-plugin
1.4.description:
This plugin adds a friendly bar at the bottom of your blog posts. All you social bookmarking services are there: Meneame, Digg, Delicious, Fresqui, Technorati, Yahoo, Google, Facebook, Enchilame, Bitacoras, Wikio, FriendFeed, Twitter and you're also able to email the post using an online Feedburner service.

Compatible with all Wordpress versions (2.3 to 3.0). Don't forget to check the config panel.

Some extra things I kept in mind:

* W3C validation and clean code
* Added social bookmark for Designers  Design Float.
* Optimized / SEO friendly outgoing links to bookmarks (rel = nofollow)
* Bookmarks open in a new tab or window (target = _blank)

Feel free to visit my blog for support or rquests of any kind.
